title: Säkerhetskonsult inom Microsoft
description:
Är du passionerad om cybersäkerhet och vill arbeta med de senaste teknologierna inom Microsofts ekosystem? Vill du vara en del av ett team där innovation, kompetens och gemenskap står i centrum? Då kan det här vara ditt nästa steg!
 



**Om rollen – Din chans att stärka cybersäkerheten i framkant! 🛡️** 




 Som
 **Säkerhetskonsult inom Microsoft** 
 hos oss får du en
 **central roll i att hjälpa våra kunder skydda sina IT-miljöer** 
 . Du kommer att:
 


* **Analysera och identifiera säkerhetsbehov** 
 hos våra kunder, med fokus på Microsofts ekosystem.
* **Utforma och implementera säkerhetslösningar** 
 som skyddar mot dagens och morgondagens hot.
* **Hålla dig uppdaterad** 
 om de senaste trenderna och teknologierna inom cybersäkerhet.
* **Samarbeta med olika team** 
 för att skapa säkra, effektiva och hållbara IT-lösningar.
* **Utbilda och vägleda kunder** 
 i bästa praxis för en säker digital arbetsmiljö.



 Den här rollen är perfekt för dig som vill
 **kombinera teknisk expertis med strategiskt tänkande** 
 och samtidigt göra verklig skillnad för företag och organisationer! 🚀
 



**Vi söker dig som…** 



* Har erfarenhet som konsult inom IT-säkerhet, gärna inom Microsofts ekosystem. ✅ Är kunnig inom identitetshantering, hotdetektering och säkerhetsarkitektur.
* Har erfarenhet av verktyg som
 **Microsoft Defender, Sentinel, Entra ID (tidigare Azure AD)** 
 och liknande.
* Är en problemlösare som gillar att hålla dig uppdaterad om de senaste säkerhetshoten.
* Har en god förståelse för både tekniska och organisatoriska säkerhetsutmaningar.
* Talar och skriver flytande svenska, för att det krävs i det dagliga arbetet.



**Vad vi erbjuder 💜** 




**Flexibilitet** 
 – vi tror på balans mellan arbete och fritid.
   

**Utvecklingsmöjligheter** 
 – utbildningar, certifieringar och nätverkande inom säkerhetsområdet.
   

**En inkluderande och engagerad företagskultur** 
 – vi tror på att ha kul på jobbet!
   

**Konkurrenskraftig lön och förmåner** 
 – för att du ska känna dig trygg och motiverad.
   

**Spännande projekt** 
 – jobba med ledande företag och organisationer i säkerhetskritiska miljöer.
 



**Vem är vi? 🤗** 




 Vi är
 **B3 Cloud** 
 , en del av B3 Consulting Group – ett av Sveriges ledande konsultbolag. Vi hjälper våra kunder att bygga framtidens IT-miljöer genom modern molnteknik och cybersäkerhet. Vi är ett
 **team på cirka 40 experter inom moln och säkerhet** 
 , och vi älskar att samarbeta, utvecklas och lösa komplexa utmaningar tillsammans! 💡
 



**Om B3 Consulting Group** 




*B3 Consulting Group är ett expansivt konsultbolag med cirka 1000 medarbetare. Vi brinner för innovation och hjälper Sveriges ledande företag och organisationer att skapa framtidens möjligheter genom digital transformation. B3 finns på* 
 tolv orter i Sverige samt i Polen, med huvudkontor i Stockholm. Bolaget grundades 2003, är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm Small Cap och omsatte 1 141 MSEK 2023.
 



*Vi är stolta över vår prisbelönta företagskultur, där olikheter, erfarenheter och gemensam energi värdesätts. Som ett etiskt och transparent bolag strävar vi efter att ha en positiv påverkan på samhället, människor och miljön. Vi är även engagerade i Women in Tech och initiativ för att stärka AI-utbildning för kvinnor. 2024 utsågs vi till Årets Employer Branding-företag, och vår HR-chef vann titeln Årets HR-chef.*
 💌
 **Låter det spännande?** 
 Hör av dig! Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig!

title: IT-Forensiker
description:
*Vill du ta nästa steg i din karriär på ett av världens ledande revisions- och rådgivningsföretag? På PwC motiveras vi av att använda vår uppfinningsförmåga, erfarenhet och den senaste tekniken för att skapa värde för våra kunder. Drivet finns hos alla som jobbar hos oss och tillsammans löser vi komplexa uppgifter, utvecklar företag och har en positiv påverkan på samhället.*
**Bli en del av PwC:s utredningsteam**
 Som medarbetare inom PwC:s forensiska team stöttar du företag och organisationer inom den privata, offentliga och finansiella sektorn. Vårt tjänsteutbud innefattar bland annat utredningar, förebyggande arbete mot ekonomiska oegentligheter och penningtvätt, visselblåsarfunktioner, bakgrundskontroller, IT-forensik samt många andra tjänster ämnade åt att identifiera oegentligheter och stärka våra kunders organisationer. Dina arbetsdagar varierar med dina projekt, ena veckan arbetar du med att genomföra IT-forensisk datainsamling hos kund, för att nästa vecka genomföra en djupgående dataanalys på vårt kontor. Du arbetar alltid tillsammans med andra i ett gemensamt team för att stötta våra kunder att lösa sina utmaningar och skapa långsiktigt hållbara lösningar. Som företag handlar vårt arbete inte bara om våra kunder och medarbetare – vi vill även bidra till ett mer hållbart och rättvist samhälle för alla. Läs mer om våra tjänsteområden inom Forensic Services.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 PwC:s forensiska team söker nu dig med minst två års erfarenhet inom IT-forensik som vill arbeta med forensiska utredningar. Arbetet inkluderar tekniska uppgifter som att säkra och bearbeta data från olika källor, samt att analysera och sammanställa komplex data. Arbetsuppgifterna varierar beroende på typen av utredning och kan skilja sig från projekt till projekt. Vi söker dig som trivs med både tekniskt arbete och andra aspekter av forensiska utredningar, och som uppskattar ett varierande arbete.
   

  

 PwC:s forensiska tjänster utgår främst från kontoret i Stockholm, så det är därför önskvärt att du bor i Stockholmsområdet eller är beredd att flytta/resa dit. Men då avdelningen befinner sig i en expansiv fas finns det dock även möjlighet att arbeta från något av våra kontor i Göteborg eller Malmö.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Vi söker en erfaren IT-forensiker med minst två års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet, gärna från Polisen eller en liknande myndighet.
   

  

 Du ska ha gedigen kunskap i att identifiera och spegla/extrahera data från relevanta datakällor med hjälp av etablerade forensiska verktyg och metoder. Dessutom förväntas du kunna utföra analyser baserade på vanligt förekommande IT-forensiska frågeställningar, såsom händelseloggsanalys samt återskapande av borttagen data.
   

  

 Erfarenhet av dataanalys och databashantering är mycket meriterande. Du har en stark förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya tekniska systemlösningar och behärskar både svenska och engelska flytande, i både tal och skrift.
   

  

 Det är meriterande om du har utbildning eller certifiering inom IT-forensik, samt kunskaper i EnCase- eller eDiscovery-plattformar som exempelvis Relativity.
   

  

 Som person är du engagerad, en skicklig problemlösare och har lätt för att bygga relationer. Du är även ansvarstagande och lägger stor vikt vid att leverera goda resultat.
   

  

 ,
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Välkommen med din ansökan till oss senast den 31 maj 2025. Vi kommer att gå igenom ansökningarna löpande och tjänsten kan tillträdas tidigare än sista ansökningsdagen.
   

  

**Tillträde:** 
 Omgående enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Vi ber dig bifoga följande handlingar med din ansökan:
   

  

* CV
* Personligt brev


**Rekryteringsprocessen**
 Vi tror på styrkan i att ha en rekryteringsprocess som gäller för alla. Som en del av urvalet använder vi oss därför av arbetspsykologiska tester med syfte att säkerställa ett objektivt, fördomsfritt och rättvist urval. Testerna är ett första steg i vår urvalsprocess. Du får en länk till dessa när vi har tagit emot din ansökan.
   

  

 Vi värdesätter det personliga mötet för att se vilket värde just du kan tillföra PwC men också vad vi kan erbjuda dig. Intervjuprocessen består vanligtvis av flera steg och olika typer av intervjuer. När du träffar HR, har du en kompetensbaserad intervju där vi tittar på personlighetstestet som du genomfört innan intervjun. Vid intervjun med verksamheten får du möjlighet att träffa det aktuella teamet för att gå igenom rollen.
   

  

 Vi kallar till intervju löpande.
   

  

 För frågor gällande tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen vänligen kontakta ansvarig rekryterare.

title: Solution Architect (Technical Service Area Network),Stockholm
description:
**🚀 Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a Solution Architect 🚀**
**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden ( Onsite )
 **Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our Solution Architect**
**About VIPAS**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description**
 VIPAS is seeking a highly skilled Solution Architect to join our client’s Technical Service Area Network team in Stockholm, Sweden. The selected candidate will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and managing a next-generation cloud-based application delivery network, ensuring high availability, efficiency, and automation. This is a unique opportunity to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment with cutting-edge network technologies, contributing to a global digital transformation journey.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead the design and implementation of network solutions aligned with business initiatives.
* Transform legacy networks into Network-as-a-Code models with an advanced service layer.
* Ensure adherence to architectural policies and guidelines in line with the roadmap.
* Document service design packages, descriptions, guidelines, processes, and routines.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to provide expertise in network architecture that meets business requirements.
* Contribute to Domain and Product Area strategy and OKRs.
* Drive cost efficiency and automation by leveraging emerging service-layer networking technologies.
* Provide technical engineering expertise and best practices for network management.
* Stay updated on industry trends, evaluating and recommending relevant advancements.
* Identify and address structural issues, functional interdependencies, and redundancies within the organization.
* Take proactive steps to solve challenges, drive innovation, and support business growth.


**Requirements**
* Extensive experience in network design and architecture.
* Proficient in high and low-level network designs.
* Expertise in planning, designing, and managing global WAN networks (ISP or enterprise-level).
* Ability to translate business needs into scalable network services.
* Hands-on experience with routing, switching, WAN optimization, MP-BGP, Ethernet QoS, DMVPN, and VPLS.
* Strong knowledge of cloud networking and multicloud connectivity solutions.
* Familiarity with network security technologies: IPS, proxy, firewall, reverse-proxy, load balancing, and VPNs.
* Experience in micro-segmentation, profiling, IP networking, SD-WAN, and SD-LAN.
* Proficient in network automation, programming, and scripting (Python, Ansible, Git).
* Hands-on experience with APIs and system integrations.
* Experience in Cisco and Aruba network environments.


**Furthermore, we believe you have expertise within one or more of following:**
* 802.1x Network Access Control
* BGP and internet routing
* Cisco ISE
* Enterprise-level Cisco Wireless
* Aruba ClearPass & Aruba Center
* PCI/DSS compliance
* Infoblox IPAM


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at
 **sandhya@vipas.se**
**Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.**
**How To Apply**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Head of Hardware
company_industry: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
Volumental is the footwear industry's leading FitTech™ company, using 3D scans and a one-of-a-kind, AI-powered recommendations engine (with 60 million scanned feet) to match everyone with the footwear styles and sizes that fit them best whether you are shopping in-store or online.
   

  

 Our vision is “a world without sizes, where every body fits”. With top brand and retail partners worldwide, including New Balance, Red Wing Shoes, The Athlete's Foot, Fleet Feet, Intersport, Sun & Sand Sports, and XXL, our footprint spans 3000+ stores across 53 countries, and growing!
   

  

**This is a unique opportunity. As our Head of Hardware, you'll be the driving force behind the hardware that powers the FitTech revolution.** 
 You'll guide the hardware development and lifecycle of our cutting-edge 3D scanners used by millions world-wide—and whatever comes next—while working together with an exceptional team of engineers. The role blends strategic thinking with hands-on expertise, perfect for someone who thrives in a creative and collaborative environment, and isn't afraid to roll up their sleeves. You will be reporting directly to our CTO.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Define and drive our hardware lifecycle strategy, owning the hardware development roadmap and ensuring that we remain the market leader.
* Explore new directions and prototype future hardware platforms, together with our product designers, software engineers, researchers, and partners.
* Cultivate and manage relationships with key vendors, including negotiation, selection, and evaluation.
* Support and help improve our hardware prduction processes, ensuring excellent quality, cost-effectiveness, and meeting industry regulations.


**We're Excited About You Because**
* You like to take initiative and make things happen, using creativity to simplify complex problems.
* You want to make a difference and you thrive when working with others towards common goals.
* You are purpose-driven, keeping your eyes on the horizon always mindful of where to go next, and never afraid to think big.
* You are always open to learning, and delighted to share your knowledge with others and help them grow.
* You have 5+ years of experience developing software driven hardware products (bonus points if it’s been within IoT, measurement devices, or retail technology).


**Why Volumental?**
* Be a part of a company that is redefining an industry. We are the global leader in 3D foot-scanning technology, and our work is transforming the footwear industry.
* Work with a talented and passionate team. We are a diverse group of individuals from across the world who care about what we do, and we are always looking for ways to improve.
* Make a real-world impact. Our technology is already helping millions of people find the perfect fitting shoes. We’ve come far, yet we’ve only just begun!


**If you're an engaged and experienced hardware professional who's ready to make a real difference, we want to hear from you.** 
 Please submit your CV and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience.

title: Business Analyst within eHealth
description:
Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in e-health with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our e-health solutions support healthcare professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish health and social care. We are growing continuously and now have about 1100 employees in several countries.
   

  

**The position**
 We are seeking a Business Analyst with a background in environment management. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, excellent communication skills, and a passion for optimizing processes. If you thrive in a collaborative environment and enjoy translating business needs into actionable solutions this might be an opportunity for you.
   

  

 As a Business Analyst, you will identify, understand and document the general requirements of our service environments and will assist the planning and scheduling upgrade activities. You will be supporting and working closely with Environment Owners, Release Management, Change Management, and technical teams to ensure smooth and reliable updates and ongoing management of our service environments.
   

  

 As a Business Analyst for Cambios service environments, you play a key role in keeping our systems running smoothly. Your responsibilities include tracking version updates and ensuring different systems work well together. You’ll also help define requirements, support change requests, and coordinate system upgrades. Acting as a main point of contact, you’ll answer questions about our service environments and upcoming changes. Additionally, you’ll assist with troubleshooting, incident management, and work to improve how the system is used and adopted across teams.
   

  

 You will be helping Cambio to provide confidence both internally and to our customers that we are providing a high quality and well managed service offering.
   

  

 At Cambio, we encourage taking initiatives that contribute to the development of the company and ourselves. For us, it is important that you should have the opportunity to grow, both as a person and as an employee. Our culture is described through the words “Trust”, “Care” and “Together” which permeate everything we do.
   

  

**About You**
 The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, excellent communication skills, and a passion for optimizing processes. You enjoy engaging with customers, partners, and eHealth organizations, and your passion lies in finding optimal solutions. We see you as analytical and well-structured. If you thrive in a collaborative environment and enjoy translating business needs into actionable solutions this might be an opportunity for you.
   

  

**Requirements** 
  

  

* Experience from working with service environment management or similar tasks
* Worked with Business analysis or similar tasks.
* Proficiency in both spoken and written Swedish and English is required


**It's a bonus if you**
* Previously have worked within healthcare.
* Experience working with ITIL
* Highly meritorious with experience of our products or services and related integration solutions
* Experience of informatics, and/or integration work
* Knowledge of healthcare standards and specifications (Open EHR, FHIR, SNOMED CT)


**Place of employment** 
 : Stockholm or Linköping
   

  

 At Cambio we value a healthy work-life balance, and to encourage that we apply a hybrid working-model. Together with your team you decide which days you work at the office. On the remaining days you can work remotely from home, but you are always more than welcome to work at the office too.
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full time
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

**Other:** 
 We screen the applications and hold interviews continuously so please send your application as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

 We encourage and eagerly welcome all applications, but we will only consider candidates who are located and have the legal right to work in Sweden
 **.** 
 We will ask for verification during the process.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
 Read more about us
 **here!**
 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at the career site
 **here!**
 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: IT RISK AND COMPLIANCE MANAGER
description:
**IT Risk and Compliance Manager**
 We believe in security by design and privacy by design and enabling our teams to proactively work with risk management and cybersecurity. The IT Risk and Compliance Manager will work on the areas of Governance, Risk & Compliance to ensure cyber security and data protection across SAS operations. In this role, you will be responsible for IT risk management including vendor risk management, data privacy policies and standards, governing risk management and data privacy processes, and ensuring compliance to these. You are directly reporting to the Head of IT Ops and SecOps, and you are a vital part of the SAS Cybersecurity Skill Hub.
   

  

**As IT Risk and Compliance Manager, your main responsibilities are to:**
* Work together with the different teams within Digital and IT to enable the teams to work more hands-on with risk management and cybersecurity
* Develop and enhance cyber and data security policies, control objectives, controls, risk management processes and standards aligned with information security regulations, best practices, and frameworks
* Oversee and drive the cyber risk management processes, incl. cybersecurity controls follow-up and vendor risk management across SAS
* Align key stakeholders on cybersecurity policies, data privacy, guide and enable cybersecurity and data privacy practices across the organization
* Assist with internal and 3rd party audits and address associated findings, such as EASA, IOSA and PCI-DSS
* Own, develop and be system administrator of our IT risk and privacy management system OneTrust


**To Be Successful, We Believe You Should Have**
* A Degree in Information Security, Privacy Management, Information Systems or Computer Science is preferred or commensurate relevant work experience
* Minimum of 5 years’ experience with focus on regulatory compliance and involvement in either data privacy management or cybersecurity management
* In-depth knowledge and understanding of global privacy legislation (e.g., GDPR)
* Knowledge and experience of cyber security standards. Specific knowledge of NIST Cyber Security Framework seen as an advantage
* Experience in translating privacy and/or security regulations into workable and implementable policies and processes
* Experience in implementing enterprise IT risk and privacy management systems, experinece from OneTrust seen as an advantage
* Fluent in English, Swedish or other Nordic languages considered as an advantage
* Experience from aviation, e-commerce and/or from large enterprises seen as an advantage
* Experience from working in a developer intense organization close to development teams seen as an advantage


**Personal Qualifications**
* Professional with a positive attitude and capable of contributing to a dynamic and team-oriented culture
* Strong analytical and interpersonal communication skills, including the ability to communicate effectively and build consensus with teams across organizational lines


 If you feel inspired by the position and feel this is the right challenge for your career, we are looking forward to receiving your application and CV!
   

  

 SAS, Scandinavia's leading airline since 1946, operates from its principal hub at Copenhagen Airport (CPH), complemented by hubs in Oslo (OSL) and Stockholm (ARN).
   

  

 Our mission is to connect Scandinavia with the world and the world with Scandinavia. Each year, SAS serves more than 25 million passengers and transports 55 tons of cargo to 135 destinations across Europe, the USA, and Asia. With a passionate workforce of over 10,000 colleagues, we collaborate with partners and customers to drive transformative changes in aviation. We are committed to achieving net-zero emissions by 2050, embodying the visionary spirit of our founders: “To move from the old to what is about to come, is the only tradition worth keeping”. Innovation and societal progress are at the heart of everything we do.
   

  

 For more information, visit our website at www.flysas.com or follow us on social media for the latest updates and promotions.

title: Senior Tester and BA (Lumera)
description:
Job Title: Senior Specialist – Lumera (Insurance) & Tester (Insurance)
 



 Location: Sweden
 



 Contract Duration: 6+ months
 



 Language Requirement: Swedish-speaking
 



  





 Client: Leading Swedish Insurance Company
 



  





 Open Positions: 2 (1 Tester and 1 BA)
 



  





 About the Role:
 



  





 Unlike traditional policy administration systems, our environment enables continuous and secure transformation of the Life and Pensions industry. We are hiring for two key roles:
 



 1. Senior Specialist – Lumera (Insurance):
 



 • Expertise in insurance with deep technical and functional knowledge of Lumera.
 



 • Experience in migration from legacy insurance systems to Lumera.
 



 • Strong understanding of Lumera’s database model.
 



 2. Tester – Insurance & Lumera:
 



 • Experience in manual testing, API validation, and Lumera’s processes.
 



  





 Senior Specialist (Lumera & Insurance):
 



  





 Key Requirements:
 



 • Strong experience in insurance industry processes.
 



 • Deep technical & functional expertise in Lumera.
 



 • Knowledge of Lumera’s database model.
 



 • Experience in migration from old insurance systems to Lumera.
 



  





 Tester (Insurance & Lumera):
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 • Create test cases based on requirements and configurations.
 



 • Execute tests in Lumera and report results in Zephyr.
 



 • Support teams with Lumera testing knowledge.
 



 • Validate XML to MetaForce and PDF outputs.
 



 • Perform SQL test data lookups in Lumera.
 



 • Assist in API call validation.

title: VP Product - Innovation & Strategy
description:
**We are the world's leading Next-Gen Mobile App security company.** 




**Promon operates at the center of innovation, emerging trends, and high-end mobile app security solutions. Some of the world's largest enterprises trust us to secure their apps from cyber threats. Working together, our global team makes the digital world safer and more secure, one app at a time.** 
**With more than a billion app users to protect, now is a fantastic time to join Promon. You'll be part of a vibrant culture and help drive our ambitious plans for the years ahead.** 
**Our headquarters is based in Oslo, Norway, and with our global footprint, we have employees and customers all over the world.** 




 Lead Promon’s product strategy and execution, ensuring alignment with customer needs, market trends, and security standards. Drive innovation, while maintaining Promon’s leadership in application security. Collaborate cross-functionally to build and execute a strategic roadmap, optimize product management processes, and mentor a high-performing team. Represent Promon as a thought leader in industry forums and customer engagements, shaping the future of secure software development.
 



**Customer Focus & Innovation** 



* Champion customer needs, challenges, and feedback in product development.
* Engage with customers, market, and internal teams to drive innovation.
* Leverage emerging technologies, including AI, to enhance product success.
* Conduct market analysis, competitive research, and trend monitoring.



**Product Vision & Strategy** 



* Collaborate with CPTO to define and execute a strategic product roadmap.
* Translate priorities into clear initiatives that maximize development capacity.
* Work with engineering, sales, and marketing to ensure outcome-driven roadmaps.
* Establish and optimize product management processes and cross-functional workflows.
* Reinforce Promon’s leadership in application security and RASP.



**Cybersecurity & Regulatory Expertise** 



* Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations.
* Apply best practices for high-security standards.
* Shape product strategies considering platform-specific challenges.
* Translate frameworks, certifications, and regulations into actionable improvements.



**Leadership & Communication** 



* Lead, coach, and mentor a high-performing product team, empowering them to reach the next level.
* Drive cross-functional alignment across product, engineering, and commercial teams.
* Articulate Promon’s vision clearly to internal teams, partners, and customers.
* Represent Promon at industry events, conferences, and key engagements.
* Cultivate relationships with influencers and support analyst engagements.
* Report on progress, challenges, and investment needs.



**Business Acumen** 



* Align product strategies with company goals to drive growth and profitability.
* Utilize SaaS expertise for data-driven decisions on pricing, packaging, and GTM strategies.
* Collaborate with sales, marketing, and business development for commercial alignment.
* Establish feedback loops to refine the product roadmap.
* Provide support for customer escalations when needed.
* Experience in senior product leadership and SaaS evangelist roles highly valued.



**To be successful in this role, we believe you have:** 




 📈
 **Proven Track Record** 
 – Successfully built and scaled the product function multiple times, ideally in a top-tier cybersecurity company. 
   





 🎯
 **Strategic Execution** 
 – proven strategic experience in translating complex security and compliance requirements into impactful product innovations. Demonstrated success in developing and executing outcome-driven product roadmaps, leveraging market analysis, competitive research, and emerging technologies.
   

  

 🛡️
 **Cybersecurity Expertise** 
 – Proven experience in cybersecurity or SaaS, with a deep curiosity and eagerness to continuously learn and adapt to evolving threats, technologies, and industry best practices.
   





**🤝 People leadership Experience** 
 –  Successfully empowered, lead, and mentored a high-performing product team, fostering a collaborative and inclusive culture that drives success.
 



 📢
 **Evangelism & Strategic Communication** 
 – Compelling storyteller skills and a charismatic industry voice, with ability to engage stakeholders while championing Promon's vision and aligning product strategy with business growth. 
 



**💡 Innovation & Emerging Tech** 
  – Proven experience in driving innovation, exploring new technologies (including AI), and challenging the status quo to create market-leading solutions.
 



**📜 Regulatory & Compliance Knowledge** 
 – Familiarity with industry standards and frameworks like ISO 27001, SOC 2, NIST, DORA, and the AI Act, with the ability to translate compliance needs into product improvements.
 



**In addition to the above, we are looking for a leader who is:** 




**Thriving:** 
 You thrive on positivity and passion, always looking for opportunities and possibilities. You balance constructive feedback with a friendly and approachable demeanor.
 



**Clear:** 
 You operate with efficiency and goal-orientation, agreeing on shared visions and setting well-articulated, measurable goals. You are an active listener who ensures understanding, while focus on the right tasks at the right time.
 



**Adaptable:** 
 You embrace solution-focused adaptability, defining success clearly and being open to new ideas. You make timely decisions, trust your team, and strive to be trusted in return.
 



**Accountable:** 
 You take responsibility for your actions, setting and achieving high standards. You link individual goals to the broader strategy, supporting your team and understanding that our collective success depends on each member's contributions.
 



**Why you'll thrive as a Promoneer:** 




 📱 At Promon you'll be at the forefront of game-changing technology, contributing to world-leading, future-focused innovations. Your contributions will help shape the future as we relentlessly pursue groundbreaking solutions that redefine industry standards.
 



 ⛷ With our Nordic values, you'll have a chance to immerse in a Nordic work culture renowned for innovation, flat hierarchy, and inclusivity.
 



 📈 Promon is planning on significant growth in the coming years. While we are growing, so will you as we encourage and support your passion, curiosity, and goals!
 



 🛡 You will work with some of the world's best app security experts and mobile security thought leaders.
 



 🌎 Get inspired, chat with our fun and engaging international team - share travel stories, cultural differences, and strange things to eat, while learning more about the world!
 



 🥳 We love to celebrate - whether it's birthdays, team wins, reaching milestones, or the joy of holidays, we embrace the spirit of celebration that brings our team closer together.
 



 💪 We value
 **Trust** 
 as the foundation of our relationships, foster
 **Curiosity** 
 to drive innovation, infuse
 **Humor** 
 into our daily work, and inspire
 **Ambition** 
 to achieve excellence in all we do.
   

  

**Where you'll work:** 




 While we have our main office in Oslo, Norway, we’re open to remote work for the right candidate—no matter where you’re located. If you’re a great fit, let’s talk!
 



*Employment at Promon is contingent upon a satisfactory verification of a general background check, including education and employment verification. Any background verifications will be obtained with written consent from the individual.*




*Promon is an equal-opportunity employer and values diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, or any other protected class.*

title: Senior Business Consultant/ Analyst - FP&A Programme
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Information Services, and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**About Us:**




**LTIMindtree** 
 is a global technology consulting and digital solutions company that enables enterprises across industries to reimagine business models, accelerate innovation, and maximize growth by harnessing digital technologies. As a digital transformation partner to more than 700+ clients, LTIMindtree brings extensive domain and technology expertise to help drive superior competitive differentiation, customer experiences, and business outcomes in a converging world. Powered by nearly 90,000 talented and entrepreneurial professionals across more than 30 countries, LTIMindtree — a Larsen & Toubro Group company — combines the industry-acclaimed strengths of erstwhile Larsen and Toubro Infotech and Mindtree in solving the most complex business challenges and delivering transformation at scale. For more information, please visit www.ltimindtree.com.
 



  





 We are hiring a Senior Business Consultant/ Analyst - FP&A Programme with below expertise:
 



  





 Highly skilled and experienced Senior Business Analyst to join the FP&A (Financial Planning & Analysis) programme. The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in understanding and gathering business requirements related to data sources and data modelling to support SAP SAC (Planning and Analytics) solutions. You will work closely with business stakeholders and IT development teams to align financial data requirements with technical capabilities, ensuring seamless integration and optimization of SAP S4, SAP SAC, and SAP Datasphere solutions within the FP&A landscape.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* **Requirements Gathering & Analysis** 
 : Collaborate with key stakeholders to gather and define business requirements for data sources and data modelling related to FP&A processes. Write Functional Specification Documents and User Stories.
* **Data Modelling & Integration** 
 : Design and implement robust data models to support the integration of financial data into SAP SAC, ensuring high data quality and alignment with FP&A objectives.
* **FP&A Process Understanding** 
 : Leverage deep knowledge of FP&A processes (budgeting, forecasting, reporting) to ensure data and reporting solutions meet business needs.
* **Solution Design** 
 : Work with technical teams to translate business requirements into functional specifications for SAP SAC, SAP S4, SAP Datasphere, Snowflake solutions. (other technologies might be in scope)
* **Collaboration with SAP Teams** 
 : Liaise with client and third party teams, to support the development and deployment of financial solutions that align with the business requirements.
* **Testing & Validation** 
 : Creation and execution of End to End test scripts, ensuring that the developed solutions meet business needs through thorough testing and validation of data models and analytics reports.



  





**Skills and Qualifications:** 



* **Experience** 
 : Proven experience as a Senior Business Analyst, specifically in FP&A programs and data modeling for financial planning and analysis.
* **Technical Expertise** 
 : Strong knowledge of
 **SAP S4** 
 ,
 **SAP SAC (Planning and Analytics)** 
 , and
 **SAP Datasphere** 
 is essential.
* **FP&A Expertise** 
 : Deep understanding of FP&A processes, including budgeting, forecasting, and financial reporting.
* **Data Modelling** 
 : Experience in designing and implementing complex data models to support financial data reporting and analysis.
* **Analytical Skills** 
 : Strong analytical skills with the ability to work with large datasets and translate complex business requirements into actionable solutions.
* **Communication** 
 : Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to work effectively with both technical and business stakeholders.
* **Problem-Solving** 
 : Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail, with the ability to identify challenges and implement solutions.



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, Finance, IT, or related field.
* Relevant certifications in SAP (S4/HANA, SAC, Datasphere) or financial analysis

title: Sales Executive - New Business - PSO
description:
Meet Unit4, a fast-paced, game-changing SaaS company revolutionizing ERP for scale-ups, mid-market organizations, and category leaders. We’re not just rewriting the rules of enterprise software; we’re tearing up the old playbook. For 40 years, the ERP industry has been bogged down by clunky, legacy systems, and we’re here to shake things up.
   

  

 At Unit4, we’re all about transformation. We empower ambitious businesses with cutting-edge ERP solutions that are adaptive, intuitive, and self-driving—designed to free organizations from the mundane and help them focus on what truly matters. Our mission? To turn work into something more meaningful while helping our customers achieve their greatest potential. Want to learn more about how we’re reshaping the future? Head to our website and see how we’re helping businesses thrive.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 We’ve got an exciting opportunity, to join our high-energy, fast-growing sales team. If you’re a natural hunter, a born deal-closer, and someone who thrives in fast-paced environments, this is your chance to shine.
   

  

 As a New Business Sales Executive, you’ll play a critical role in driving digital transformation for scale-ups, mid-market organizations, and category leaders in the Professional Services sector. Your mission: sell Unit4’s ERP Financial and HCM solutions, win new logos, and help our clients unlock their true potential.
   

  





  

*This is a hybrid role based out of our Stockholm office.*




 What You’ll Do
   

  




* Craft and execute a killer new business sales strategy to hit ambitious targets in the Professional Services vertical.
* Qualify leads like a pro and engage key decision-makers with a consultative, value-driven approach.
* Own complex sales cycles from start to finish, orchestrating cross-functional teams—pre-sales, value engineering, marketing, and more—to close big deals.
* Deliver powerful, results-oriented presentations to C-level execs, focusing on their core challenges and the Office of the CFO.
* Help prospects see the business impact of our solutions, turning skeptics into believers.
* Stay ahead of the curve by mastering our tech and keeping up with industry trends


**Qualifications**
* You’re a go-getter with at least 3-5 years of experience selling complex SaaS solutions.
* You have a proven track record in ERP or financial SaaS sales (mandatory).
* You’re a pro at navigating the Professional Services sector and understand its unique needs.
* Business processes? You know them inside and out.
* You have the charisma to inspire, the resilience to negotiate, and the vision to guide clients toward success.
* You’re a team player with a hunter’s mindset, always looking for that next big win.
* You’re comfortable engaging and influencing C-level executives, turning tough challenges into bold opportunities.
* Mentorship, leadership, and collaboration come naturally to you—you’re always ready to lift others while driving results.


**Additional Information**

 Why Unit4?
   

  





  

 At Unit4, we believe in big ideas, bold action, and breaking barriers. Here’s what sets us apart:
   

  




* Freedom to Thrive: We trust you to own your role and drive success, offering autonomy and flexibility.
* Uncapped Time Off: Take the time you need to recharge—your well-being matters.
* Global Wellbeing Days: When we say “switch off,” we mean it. We all take time to prioritize health and balance.
* Next-Level Talent: Collaborate with some of the sharpest minds in the software industry.
* Purpose-Driven Impact: Be part of our Act4Good program, where innovation meets sustainability to make the world better.
* Inclusive Culture: We’re committed to diversity, equity, and belonging through our Employee Resource Groups like Women at Unit4, Pride at Unit4, and Mental Health & Access at Unit4.



 This is your chance to join a company that’s as ambitious as you are. If you’re ready to disrupt the status quo and make a real impact, let’s talk.
   

  

 Ready to take the leap? Apply now and let’s make work better, together.

title: Drifttekniker
description:
Det är på regeringens uppdrag som Statens fastighetsverk (SFV) förvaltar vårt gemensamma natur- och kulturarv. Vi förvaltar en mångfald av statligt ägda fastigheter – däribland regeringsbyggnader, domstolar, slott och kungsgårdar, teatrar, museer, ambassader samt en sjundedel av landets yta bestående av skog och mark.
   

  

 Som medarbetare är vi stolta över att vara anställda på en myndighet, arbeta utifrån den statliga värdegrunden och få bidra till en positiv samhällsutveckling.
   

  

**SFV Stockholm centralt** 
 förvaltar byggnader på bland annat Skepps- och Kastellholmen, Riddarholmen, Gamla stan samt på Djurgården. Bland våra hyresgäster finns bland annat myndigheter, museer samt restaurang- och hotellverksamhet. Våra fantastiska byggnader har alla en historia att berätta och lockar besökande från hela världen.
   

  

**Tjänsten**
 Vi är en grupp kollegor i varierande ålder med olika bakgrund som tillsammans bidrar till att långsiktigt vårda vårt gemensamma kulturarv. Som drifttekniker ansvarar du för driften i ett antal byggnader i tätt samarbete med övriga kollegor på fastighetsområdet. I unika miljöer och på marknadsmässiga villkor levererar vi tillsammans en förstklassig drift och förvaltning gentemot våra hyresgäster.
   

  

 Vårt arbete är väldigt varierande och omväxlande, den ena dagen är inte den andra lik. Exempel på arbetsuppgifter som ingår är tillsyn och skötsel, mediauppföljning och driftoptimering, SBA, avhjälpande underhåll samt medverkan i projekt.
   

  

 Det kan även ingå att ha ett områdesövergripande ansvar för vissa arbetsuppgifter, till exempel brandskyddssamordnare. Då beredskapstjänstgöring, med en timmes inställelsetid, kan bli aktuellt är B-körkort ett krav.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Vi söker dig som har en utbildning inom driftteknik eller motsvarande, alternativt har du skaffat dig likvärdig kompetens i arbetslivet. Vi ser det som meriterande om du har god kunskap om fastighetsautomation, mediauppföljning, driftoptimering samt systematiskt brandskyddsarbete. Då arbete i olika IT-system ingår i tjänsten krävs god datavana.
   

  

 Du uttrycker dig väl på svenska i både tal och skrift.
   

  

**Personliga egenskaper**
 För oss är dina personliga egenskaper viktiga då driften är SFV´s ansikte utåt. Du uppskattar det personliga mötet, gillar att skapa och underhålla personliga och yrkesmässiga kontakter med såväl hyresgäster, kollegor som entreprenörer.
   

  

 Som person är du nyfiken och gillar att ta egna initiativ för att hitta smarta lösningar som förbättrar våra arbetssätt. Att dela med dig av dina erfarenheter och kunskaper ser du som självklart.
   

  

 Du tar ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och driver ditt arbete framåt, både på egen hand och i grupp. Strukturerat arbetssätt samt ordning och reda är en förutsättning för att du ska lyckas i rollen. Att arbeta i kulturhistoriska miljöer är något du värdesätter och du har förståelse för de speciella krav som ställs.
   

  

**Mer information**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning. SFV tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning.
   

  

 För frågor är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Pierre Svanberg tfn 010-478 74 55.
   

  

 Fackliga representanter för Saco, Seko och OFR/S nås via vår växel, 010-478 70 00. Mer information om SFV hittar du på www.sfv.se
   

  

 Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kan en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) komma att genomföras. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och i vissa fall krävs svenskt medborgarskap.
   

  

 Statens fastighetsverk verkar inom branscher som är exponerade mot olika risker för oegentligheter, i förbyggande syfte förekommer därför tjänster där lämplighetsprövning genomförs.
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag är 2025-02-28 och vi ser fram emot din ansökan och CV.
   

  

 Välkommen till oss!

title: Systemarkitekt till SOS Alarm
description:
*Vill du arbeta i en nyckelroll där din tekniska kompetens gör konkret samhällsnytta?* 




*På SOS Alarm får du vara med och bygga robusta, pålitliga system som räddar liv. Vi söker nu en person med bakgrund inom utveckling som vill ta ansvar för att omvandla visioner och krav till verklig systemarkitektur.* 




  





  





**Din vardag som Systemarkitekt** 




 Hos oss kommer du att ha en central och avgörande roll i vår tekniska miljö. Du är länken som binder samman våra utvecklingsteam, produktägare, lösningsarkitekter och driftavdelning.
 



  





  





**I rollen kommer du bland annat att:** 




  




* Utveckla och vidareutveckla arkitekturen för våra samhällsviktiga kärnsystem, där robusthet och säkerhet är högsta prioritet.



  




* Omvandla verksamhetens krav till en tekniskt hållbar systemarkitektur och säkerställa att lösningarna möter såväl dagens som morgondagens behov.



  




* Stötta våra utvecklingsteam genom att skapa tydliga riktlinjer och best practices inom utveckling, integration och infrastruktur.



  




* Bistå med expertis kring integrationer, API:er och systeminfrastruktur i Azure-molnmiljö och on-prem-lösningar.



  




* Samarbeta tätt med andra roller i teamet för att optimera vårt releaseförfarande och bidra till en smidig och stabil drift av våra system.



  





  





  





**Vad vi erbjuder dig:** 




  




* En arbetsmiljö där dina idéer och initiativ värdesätts.
* Goda möjligheter till personlig utveckling.
* Kollegor med ett stort engagemang och en stark laganda.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med samhällskritisk teknik som ständigt behöver finnas tillgänglig.
* En flexibel arbetsmiljö där du har möjlighet att arbeta i en hybridlösning - en kombination av arbete på vårt kontor i centrala Stockholm och på distans.



  





  





  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi tror att du har haft en liknande roll tidigare, kanske som Systemarkitekt eller Teknisk Team Lead, och att du har en solid bakgrund inom systemutveckling.
 



  





  





**Du har:** 




  




* Gedigen erfarenhet av att arbeta med .NET-plattformen. (.Net Core, Angular mm.)



  




* En passion för att designa och vidareutveckla hållbara och robusta tekniska lösningar.



  




* Djup förståelse för API:er och integrationer – både i nya och äldre system.



  





  





 I denna roll kommer ditt fokus att ligga på arkitektur och att ha ett helikopterperspektiv på lösningarna. Du är flexibel och kan stötta utvecklingsteamen när det behövs.
 



 Det är även meriterande om du har erfarenhet av att arbeta nära IT-drift och en god förståelse för IT-infrastruktur.
 



  





  





**Ansökan** 




 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med House of Skills.
 



 Har du frågor? Kontakta gärna Linda Freij (linda.freij@houseofskills.se) eller Linda Mukka (linda.mukka@houseofskills.se).
 



 Urval sker löpande, så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
 



  





  





  





***Mer om SOS Alarm***




*Vi på SOS Alarm arbetar för ett tryggare Sverige för alla. Det gör vi genom att hjälpa människor i nödsituationer, hantera larm, koordinera arbete vid olyckor och kriser, samt genom att aktivt bevaka händelser och trender på nationell och global nivå. Vi gör allt detta i samverkan med våra kunder och partners - dygnet runt, årets alla dagar. Många är framför allt bekanta med vår leverans av det nationella nödnumret 112, men vi erbjuder även ett växande antal innovativa tjänster för både den privata och offentliga marknaden.* 




  





*SOS Alarm genomför säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll på sin personal enligt kraven ur säkerhetsskyddslag (2018:585). Även en kontroll enligt Lag (1974:191) om bevakningsföretag utförs och är aktiv under anställningsperioden. Drogtest utan anmärkning är en förutsättning för anställning. Tjänsten innebär även krigsplacering vid SOS Alarm.*

title: Customer Success Manager
description:
**A Scaleup Journey + Entrepreneurial Environment!**
 Join Lime Go, a scaleup within Lime Technologies Sweden AB (publ). This is your chance to be part of a fast-moving, ambitious team while enjoying the success of a publicly listed company.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For?** 
 🤓
   

  

* 3+ years of experience in Sales or Customer Success.
* Proven B2B and SaaS experience—bonus if it's in CRM!
* Strong ability and motivation to retain and expand customer portfolios (a few hundred accounts).
* A customer-oriented doer who loves customer interaction and delivering value.
* A team player who likes responsibility in a dynamic and rapidly changing environment.
* Entrepreneurial mindset and excitement about the scaleup journey.


**Your Role on Our Team?** 
 👨🏻‍🤝‍👨🏻
   

  

* Own and manage a portfolio of B2B customers, building strong relationships and success.
* Retain, upsell, and grow accounts by challenging our customers to adopt new features.
* Deliver customer tailored demos (both online and in person).
* Own and be responsible for an order intake budget.
* Be a voice of the customer internally—collaborating with product and sales teams.


**The Product?** 
 🤑
   

  

 Lime Go is a Data Enriched Sales CRM for SMBs in the Nordics. With 1000 customers in Sweden, Norway, and Denmark, we’re aiming to expand throughout Europe to become the Category King within our niche.
   

  

**What’s the Journey?** 
 🚀
   

  

 We’re a team of 20 people, laser-focused on aggressive growth. Join us and be part of our scaleup journey as we continue to grow.
   

  

**Skills & Requirements**
**Requirements?**
* Bachelor’s degree 🎓 + Driver’s license 🚙
* SaaS/Startup/Scaleup experience
* Ready to work from our Stockholm office 🎈
* Fluent in Swedish and English 🎭


**Reporting & Growth**
 You’ll report directly to our Sales Manager, with regular 1:1s and be part of the Revenue Operations team (Sales, CS, Marketing & Product).
   

  

**Benefits & Perks?** 
 💸
   

  

* Competitive base salary + commission on portfolio growth
* Generous employee perks and benefits: collective agreement, company conferences and parties, 6 weeks vacation, pension, monthly pubs, merch, wellness allowance, and more
* Tons of team activities and laughs along the way!


**The Hiring Process?** 
 💻
   

  

* Screening call
* Interview
* In-depth interview with CS Team Manager (Patrik) & Lime Go Director (Max)
* Case assignment to show off your skills
* Reference check
* Final interview with Lime Group CEO (Nils) & Max


 Don’t miss the chance to kickstart your career at Lime Go - Apply now.
   

  

 Let’s Go!

title: Internship | Deals and Corporate Finance
description:
**Kickstart your career with one of the world's leading firms in audit and advisory. Whether your passion lies in sustainability, AI, or numbers, we offer opportunities for you to reach your full potential. At PwC, we are driven by creativity, experience, and the latest technology to generate value for our clients. Together, we strive towards shared goals: building trust, driving positive change, and creating long-term sustainable value. Do you want to be a part of our team?**
**Join our Deals team**
 As a member of PwC:s Deals team, you will support companies and their owners in acquisitions, divestments, restructuring and financing across various industries. We place a high value on your personal development – and you will have the opportunity to shape your own path based on your interests. At PwC we offer coaching, tailored training programs. Whether your interest lies in business valuation or post-deal integration, you will always grow your skills within problem-solving, analytical thinking and relationship building. A typical workday is varied, always involving close collaboration with your project team, as well as with our clients, to solve their challenges. We are committed to ensuring that our work not only benefits our clients and staff – but also contributes to a more sustainable society in the future.
   

  

 Depending on your interests we now offer internship positions within the following business areas:
   

  

**Mergers & Acquisitions/Corporate Finance**
 A career in our M&A practice will provide you the opportunity to be part of the leading mid market M&A advisor in Sweden. We have completed more transactions than anyone else in the market for 12 consecutive years. We act as lead financial advisors to entrepreneurs, private equity, and corporate clients throughout the entire divestiture process, from origination to deal completion. The team comprises 35 M&A professionals in Sweden and 2,500 globally. Read more about M&A.
   

  

 As An M&A Intern, You Are Part Of a Project Team Of 4-5 Individuals And Your Main Tasks Include Assisting In The Following
   

  

* Conducting market and company research
* Financial analysis and valuations
* Producing pitch decks for potential new engagements
* Producing marketing materials used during a sales process, including Teaser and Information Memorandum


**Transaction Services/Financial Due Diligence**
 At Financial Due Diligence (FDD), we're looking for creative, curious, and detail-oriented individuals to join our rapidly growing Stockholm team. Dive into the analysis of companies’ key value drivers, offering insightful perspectives on historical and future financial performance. Your role will be pivotal in supporting large private equity and corporate clients to maximise transaction value and identify key financial risks. If you're a creative thinker with a natural curiosity and keen attention to detail, eager to contribute to transformative transactions, then you are who we are looking for. Read more about Transaction Services/Financial Due Diligence.
   

  

 Your main tasks as an intern at Transaction Services/Financial Due Diligence
   

  

* Use data analytics tool Alteryx in combination with the Excel Power Tools to build data workflows to enable aggregation and analysis of complex data sets
* Assist in preparing due diligence reports to summarise key analytical findings


**Are you our new colleague within PwC Deals?**
 We believe it is important that you are trustworthy and that you are interested in establishing contacts and maintaining relations. You enjoy collaborating with others and you contribute with your enthusiasm and positive attitude. You will have a great advantage of strong analytical skills, ability to understand and navigate complexity and a passion for problem solving. And you will definitely succeed if you have a curious and growth mindset as well as a humble and friendly attitude.
   

  

**Qualifications For The Position**
* Bachelor's degree in business, finance, industrial economics or engineering
* You are comfortable in written and verbal professional communication in English
* You are comfortable in written and verbal professional communication in Swedish (only for the M&A team)


**We would prefer if you**
 Meritorious if you are at the beginning of your Master's education
   

  

**What can you expect from us at PwC?**
* Purpose-driven and innovative work: We are a community of solvers who endeavours to create long-term and sustainable results – for our employees, customers and society as a whole.
* Inclusive leadership and teamwork: as an integral part of an inclusive community
* A workplace where employees are the focus: We are a company that leads with heart, and you are our most valuable asset. To help you reach your full potential, a sustainable and balanced work approach is essential.
* Future-focused development: We aim to help you to achieve your full potential by encouraging you to shape your own future – and support you during this journey.
* Flexibility at the forefront: We support you in choosing how, when and where you work to solve your tasks in the best possible way.


 ,
   

  

**Start date:** 
 As an Intern applicant you are to be available for full-time employment for one semester during the fall 2025, starting in August.
   

  

**Please Attach The Following Documents To Your Application**
* CV
* Cover letter
* Transcript from university/college (add file under “other”)
* Specify in your application for which business area you are applying


 We believe in having a recruitment process that applies to everyone. As part of the selection, we use psychometric tests to ensure an objective, unbiased, and fair selection. The tests are the first step in our selection process. You will receive a link to these tests after we have received your application.
   

  

 We value the personal meeting to understand the value you can bring to PwC and what we can offer you. The interview process usually consists of multiple stages and various types of interviews. When meeting with HR, you will have a competency-based interview where we examine the personality test you completed before the interview. During the interview with the business, you will have the opportunity to meet with the relevant team to discuss the role. We call for interviews continuously, and we encourage you to apply as soon as possible.

title: Manager Systems Integration and Verification
company_industry: Defense and Space Manufacturing, Security and Investigations, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
*Want to influence the bigger picture? At Saab, you can realise amazing innovations that keep people and societies safe. Together, we can truly make an impact – and your part matters.*
 Your Role
   

  

 We are looking for an inclusive and inspiring leader to take responsibility for a team working with integration and verification of Electronic Warfare systems at Fighter Core Capability Design.
   

  

 As a manager, you will play a key role in fostering an environment where innovation, collaboration, and professional growth thrive. You will be responsible for the team’s development and results, including budget management, resource and competence planning, and ensuring a sustainable and engaging work environment for your employees.
   

  

 You will work closely with other managers and project leaders to build strong, high-performing teams that make a real impact. The team consists of around 15 dedicated professionals working with system integration and verification of EW systems.
   

  

 You will be a part of the Fighter Core Capability (FCC) business unit, which provides innovative systems and services that utilise the electromagnetic spectrum for protection, detection, location and monitoring. It also provides tools for intelligence analysis of the information gathered. FCC is a part of the Business Area Surveillance, read more here.
   

  

 The Integration and Verification section is organized within the System Test Design department. The System Test Design department is responsible for system integration and verification. We also have responsibility to develop test equipment and software systems needed for integration and verification. You will be part of System Test Design leadership team, a great team at work, with genuine interest in those we lead.
   

  

 Your profile
   

  

 You have a coaching leadership and build relationships within the organization. You have the ability to drive change and progress. You have an interest to lead change and work with continuous improvement of our test engineering methods. You know that test is an important and integrated part of product development.
   

  

 Required skills:
   

  

* A genuine interest to lead and coach people
* Interest in making improvements
* Good communication skills
* Appropriate professional or postgraduate qualification


 Desired skills:
   

  

* A technical background within product development
* Experience as a manager
* Understanding of test automation benefits and challenges


 Saab is an international organization and it is important that you handle both Swedish and English fluently, in speech and writing.
   

  

 This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply
   

  

 What you will be a part of
   

  

 Behind our innovations stand the people who make them possible. Brave pioneers and curious minds. Everyday heroes and inventive troubleshooters. Those who share deep knowledge and those who explore sky-high. And everyone in between.
   

  

 Joining us means making an impact together, contributing in our own unique ways. From crafting complex code and building impressive defence and security solutions to simply sharing a coffee with a colleague, every action counts. We encourage you to take on challenges, to create smart inventions and grow in our friendly and tech-savvy workspace. We have a solid mission to keep people and society safe.
   

  

 Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 25,500 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.
   

  

 Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here
   

  

 If you are interested in what benefits you can take part of as an employee at Saab in Sweden, you can read more about them here
   

  

 Do you want to get to know our business and our people a little bit better? Here you can find some stories told by our employees.
   

  

 Kindly observe that this is an ongoing recruitment process and that the position might be filled before the closing date of the advertisement.

title: Solution Architect- Swedish Speaking
job_function: Business Development, Sales, and Information Technology
description:

 Solution Architect- Swedish Speaking
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden (hybrid)
 



  





*Wipro Limited (NYSE: WIT, BSE: 507685, NSE: WIPRO) is a leading global information technology, consulting and business process services company. We harness the power of cognitive computing, hyper-automation, robotics, cloud, analytics and emerging technologies to help our clients adapt to the digital world and make them successful. A company recognized globally for its comprehensive portfolio of services, strong commitment to sustainability and good corporate citizenship, we have over 240,000 dedicated employees serving clients across six continents. Together, we discover ideas and connect the dots to build a better and a bold new future.* 




  





 This role belongs to our Nordics subsidiary with a headquarter in Stockholm.
 



  





 We provide Application support and development services to our customer. The services include coordination with other suppliers as well as making code/configuration changes. The project requires handling of Major as well as minor applications issues. We are looking for resources who have strong technical skills but also good at learning functional skills too.

A career at Wipro offers just that and a lot more.*

title: Senior Data Consultant & People Manager
description:
Are you ready to take your career to the next level? We’re seeking our next People Manager for the Engagement and Advisory unit—a role that combines leadership and hands-on work as a Data professional consultant.
   

  

 As a People Manager, you will build and lead a team of 5-10 consultants, focusing on coaching, career development, and creating a positive work environment. We believe in empowering our managers to prioritize people and clients over administrative tasks.
   

  

 At Capgemini Insights & Data, you will develop both business and technical skills in a supportive work environment that values community and team spirit.
   

  

**What You’ll Do As a People Manager**
* Lead by Example: Be the go-to person for our employees, providing guidance and support.
* Individual Growth & well-being: Conduct regular 1-on-1s, helping consultants plan their careers and achieve their goals. You will foster engagement and well-being within your team.
* Balancing Act & Self-leadership: While supporting your team, maintain your own client-oriented work. Utilization and business development are key.


 In your day-to-day work, you will be contributing as a Senior Data consultant, wearing different hats depending on the context. But your role and responsibilities are at all times related to Advisory, Project & Engagement Management.
   

  

**What You’ll Do as a Consultant:**
* Depending on your role you will work close with our clients and drive initiatives involving data warehouses, analytics, AI, MDM, and strategy development at customer sites.


**YOUR PROFILE**
* You are an experienced data professional within the Data, AI & Analytics field, for example as a delivery manager, business analyst, project manager, program manager or engagement manager.
* You are driven by creating effective teams and contributing by giving the team members the best possible conditions to achieve smart solutions.
* Fluent Swedish skills


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
 We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.  At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities. Equip yourself with valuable certifications in the latest technologies such as Databricks and Microsoft Azure or focus on strengthening your leadership skills.
   

  

**APPLICATION**
 Ready to join our team? Apply Now!
   

  

**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world while creating a tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market-leading capabilities in AI, cloud, and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.
   

  

**Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com**

title: Account Executive - Sweden/Denmark
description:
**About Us**
 Are you ready to be part of history? At Telgea.com, we are revolutionising the mobile communication industry, by building the world's first and only global mobile carrier company. As Account Executive , you will play a pivotal role in helping businesses manage mobile plans across the globe, setting global communication free.
   

  

 Read here about what we achieved in just 6 months: https://t.ly/fEfe2
   

  

**The role**
 Your role is to help solve mid-level enterprise’s telecom pains by showing them how Telgea makes connectivity across borders seamless and efficient. You’ll own the entire sales cycle, from prospecting to closing, and play an essential role in driving our growth.
   

  

 If you are an experienced B2B salesperson who thrives on building relationships, closing deals, and collaborating with a team, there is a big opportunity waiting for you!
   

  

 At Telgea, your resilience and skills will be rewarded with competitive compensation, uncapped bonuses, and a journey few ever experience.
   

  

**To Impress Us, You**
* Take ownership of the entire sales funnel, from prospecting leads to negotiating and closing deals.
* Understand Telgea’s value proposition and effectively communicate it to IT managers and champions.
* Collaborate with teammates to identify creative ways to exceed sales targets.
* Consistently track your sales activities in HubSpot to manage pipelines effectively.


**To Be Promoted, You**
* Continuously expand your knowledge of Telgea’s solutions and the B2B telecom industry.
* Not only meet but exceed your monthly and annual sales targets.
* Demonstrate the skills and mindset needed to step into a leadership role.


**Who You Are**
 You are a native speaker in Swedish or Danish. You can share at least one reference demonstrating your success in account-based selling or multi-stakeholder B2B deals. You have experience working with businesses in the 50-1,000 employee range and understand the importance of building trust in the sales processes.
   

  

**Your Friends Agree That You Are**
* A great communicator and listener
* Highly competitive
* Approachable and trustworthy
* Persistent and resourceful


**Your Former Colleagues Agree That You Are**
* Confident in high-stakes negotiations
* Resilient in the face of rejection
* A proactive problem-solver
* Collaborative and a team player


**You Agree On The Following About Yourself**
* I thrive in fast-paced, results-oriented environments.
* I’m motivated by closing deals and helping clients succeed.
* I’m eager to learn new skills and technologies to improve my performance.
* I value constructive feedback and use it to grow professionally.
* I enjoy being part of a team that works hard and celebrates success together.


**Why Join Us**
* Enjoy a competitive OTE of 100,000 USD (1/3 Fixed) and uncapped bonuses.
* Join a sales team where your contributions are directly tied to the company’s growth.
* Work with talented individuals who hold themselves and each other to high standards.
* Participate in optional full-company trips four times a year to connect and collaborate with teammates.
* Work with autonomy and flexibility, blending work and personal life seamlessly.
* Be part of a fast-growing company at the forefront of telecom innovation, delivering impactful solutions to global businesses.
* Become a shareholder by earning monthly company shares.


**Location** 
 : Stockholm, Sweden

title: Domain Consultant STRATA
description:
**Our Mission**
 At Palo Alto Networks® everything starts and ends with our mission:
   

  

 Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life.
   

  

 Our vision is a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before. We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and we’re looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 We take our mission of protecting the digital way of life seriously. We are relentless in protecting our customers and we believe that the unique ideas of every member of our team contributes to our collective success. Our values were crowdsourced by employees and are brought to life through each of us everyday - from disruptive innovation and collaboration, to execution. From showing up for each other with integrity to creating an environment where we all feel included.
   

  

 As a member of our team, you will be shaping the future of cybersecurity. We work fast, value ongoing learning, and we respect each employee as a unique individual. Knowing we all have different needs, our development and personal wellbeing programs are designed to give you choice in how you are supported. This includes our FLEXBenefits wellbeing spending account with over 1,000 eligible items selected by employees, our mental and financial health resources, and our personalized learning opportunities - just to name a few!
   

  

**Job Description**
**Your Career**
 As a Domain Consultant STRATA for network security transformation, you provide technical expertise and guidance in customers' network security and zero trust journey. You will be key in defining technical solutions that secure a customer’s key business imperatives. You evangelize our industry leadership in on-prem, cloud, and security services that establish Palo Alto Networks as a customer’s cybersecurity partner.
   

  

**Your Impact**
* Collaborate with sales teams to recommend and develop customer solutions within your assigned specialization
* Architect solutions that will help our customers strengthen and simplify their security posture
* Present to customers as our expert at all levels in the customer hierarchy, from practitioner to senior leadership
* Lead and support customer demonstrations that showcase our unique value proposition
* Responsible for prospective customers and partners' Technical Validation projects based on best practices to ensure technical win in assigned opportunities
* Document high-level design and key use cases to ensure proper implementation and value realization of Palo Alto Networks solutions
* Lead conversations about industry trends and emerging changes to the security landscape
* Responsible for discussing and highlighting product alignment with customer requirements and differentiation
* As the main technical point of contact for Network Security, you will assist and collaborate to respond effectively to RFIs/RFPs
* Position Palo Alto Networks or Partner delivered services as appropriate to ensure proper implementation and value realization of Palo Alto Networks solutions
* Discuss, with credibility, competitive offers in the marketplace and position ours as the best alternative


**Qualifications**
**Your Experience**
* Multiple years of specialist experience in pre-sales/sales engineering within one or more of the following specialisms - Zero Trust, SaaS Security, SSE/SASE, Networking or Network Security
* Being the expert addition to the technical sales function
* Solid understanding of NGFW, Network Security, SASE, SD-WAN, CASB, Proxy, DLP and BYOD Solutions
* Experience in working with customers, demonstrating problem-solving skills and a can-do attitude
* Business fluent in Swedish and English


**Additional Information**
**The Team**
 Our Domain Consultant team members work hand-in-hand with organizations around the world to keep their digital environments protected. We educate, inspire,and empower our potential clients in their journey to security.
   

  

 You are empowered with unmatched systems and tools and a team built on joint success. You won’t find someone at Palo Alto Networks that isn’t committed to your success – with everyone pitching in to assist when it comes to solutions selling, learning, and development. Our Solutions Consulting community is driven by the mission to be our customers’ cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting their digital way of life.
   

  

**Our Commitment**
 We’re problem solvers that take risks and challenge cybersecurity’s status quo. It’s simple: we can’t accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together.
   

  

 We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability. If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need, please contact us at accommodations@paloaltonetworks.com.
   

  

 Palo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics.

title: New business sales consultant for HP workstations
company_industry: Computer Hardware Manufacturing, Software Development, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Overview:** 
 HP has built a world-class products and solutions organization, achieved significant growth and delivering impactful outcomes for our customers. At the heart of our success is our use of cutting-edge technology and AI to drive performance and innovation. As we look to the future, HP is accelerating with high-performance, AI-enhanced Z workstations and Gen AI-driven workflows and solutions. Join us in shaping the future of technology.
   

  

**Job Summary:** 
 We are seeking an experienced New business sales consultant for HP workstations to drive the growth and success of HP’s high-performance Z workstations, software, graphics, and associated technical solutions. This individual will focus on building strong relationships with new clients, crafting tailored solutions to meet their needs, and identifying new opportunities to grow the business.
